slide 14 to 17 of 6

[January 08, 2025 5

Payment Drop Box for Residents

**Egg Harbor Township residents now have a secure and convenient option for tax payments with the newly installed 24/7 drop box.**  
Located in front of Town Hall, adjacent to the Tax Collector's office, the drop box provides residents with the flexibility to make payments at their convenience, without the need for an appointment or office visit.

**Location:**  
3515 Bargaintown Road  
Egg Harbor Township, NJ 08234

Make your payments securely, on your own schedule, and enjoy the ease of this 24/7 service.

Read more](https://www.ehtnj.gov/news_detail_T23_R288.php)

[December 18, 2025 0

Egg Harbor Township Implements Online Publication of Legal Notices

Read more](https://www.ehtnj.gov/news_detail_T23_R323.php)

[November 25, 2025 1

Park Improvement Projects at Tony Canale Park & Veteran’s Memorial Park

Temporary closures this winter and spring will lead to safer, upgraded fields and park amenities.

Read more](https://www.ehtnj.gov/news_detail_T23_R322.php)

[February 11, 2025 2

Watch the latest Township Committee meeting.

**Welcome to the Official Egg Harbor Township Committee Meeting Video!**

In this meeting, we cover essential topics affecting our community, including:

* **Updates from Township Officials**
* **Discussion of Current Projects**
* **Open Forum for Resident Input**
* **Upcoming Events and Initiatives**

**Thank you for watching and for being an active part of our community!**

Read more](https://www.ehtnj.gov/news_detail_T23_R211.php)

[February 11, 2025 3

EHT Nature Reserve is a passive recreation paradise

The Nature Reserve is a 220-acre sanctuary nestled within a residential community in Egg Harbor Township, NJ. This expansive reserve consists of three distinct components: an environmental learning center, a serene lake area, and a wooded forest.

Each component features diverse terrain, providing a unique setting for a variety of recreational activities. Visitors can enjoy biking, hiking, fishing, and bird watching in this peaceful and pristine environment.

Read more](https://www.ehtnj.gov/news_detail_T23_R101.php)

[February 11, 2025 4

Public Works 2026 Bulk Collection Schedule

**Bulk Waste**

Bulky waste includes bamboo, wood, lumber, brush,  
upholstered furniture, bedding, mattresses, etc.  
During your scheduled week, items are collected by different trucks

Place items curbside on your bulk waste week (as indicated below)  
Bulk waste must be at the curb by 6:00 a.m. on Monday of your scheduled week

**Schedule for Bulk Waste Pickup is as follows:**

Monday or Tuesday Trash Day - Bulk pickup is the first (1st) full (7 days) calendar week of each month

Wednesday Trash Day - Bulk pick up is the second (2nd) full (7 days) calendar week of each month  
Thursday Trash Day - Bulk pick up is the third (3rd) full (7 days) calendar week of each month  
Friday Trash Day - Bulk pickup is the fourth (4th)  week of each month

Read more](https://www.ehtnj.gov/news_detail_T23_R278.php)

meet the
Mayor
--------------

Welcome to the Township of Egg Harbor. The Township is The Heart of Atlantic County, a large and diverse community, that provides great amenities and services.  The Township Committee and I welcome your input and assistance as we govern this great Township together.

-Mayor Pfrommer
[Read More](https://www.ehtnj.gov/government/elected_officials/index.php)
